textBeforeTable: 10.2.1 FP7 10.2.1 FP6 10.2.1 FP5 10.2.1 FP4 10.2.1 FP3 10.2.1 FP2 10.2.1 FP1 10.2.1 Tab navigation Content A comprehensive list of defect corrections for major releases, refresh packs and fix packs of Cognos Business Intelligence 10.2.1. Details of the APARs listed below can be accessed by clicking the link for the APAR number. If you have questions about a particular defect, please contact Customer Support. Note: Fixes previously available in Cognos BI 10.2.1 FP1 Feature Bundle are included in Cognos BI 10.2.1 FP3. Abstract Release notes Cognos Business Intelligence 10.2.1 Fix Lists Search Site map
